welcomeText.heading: Welcome to CareMatch Japan
points: We humbly aim to support Japan’s ageing society by connecting neighbors who need a little help with volunteers who wish to serve.
This web app safely matches small, everyday requests — grocery assistance, clinic escort, light chores, check-ins — with trusted local helpers.
How to participate (as a helper): create a volunteer profile, complete a simple verification, choose your area and availability, then apply to nearby requests.
How to request support (as a family or senior): post a request with time and place, review offers from nearby volunteers, and confirm a booking.

For foreign nationals: the app supports English and simple Japanese. Your kindness, time, and curiosity are welcome. This is a respectful way to contribute to community life in Japan while learning and growing.
What we value: safety, privacy, punctuality, and warm, patient communication with seniors and families.
Ways to help: short shopping trips, tidy-up support, friendly walks, ‘I’m OK’ check-ins, and other small acts that make daily life easier.
Please help us keep the service reliable: use your real name, check in at start/end of visits, and leave short reviews so trust can grow.
We are a small team and grateful for feedback. If you notice barriers or have ideas, please let us know so we can improve.
